title: STOREEZ
description: Our mission in this project was to modify the frontend and the backend of an existing E-commerce project. The mission toke two months. We collaborate three members to complete this project.

title: Originart
description: This project is a portfolio where can the Originart agency expose their works, the website contain a contact form created using PHP Mailer.

title: UUD
description: The mission was to create the backend using Node js, Express js and MongoDb for the database. In addition, I helped in the front end by using React js, Redux, and Soket.io for a real time chat.

title: Colleg Assist
description: Inside SmartPeddle company, my mission was to structure the database and create the REST API using Node j's and Express j's, it's an internship for six months.

title: Saba Embroidery
description: This project is a freelance mission. It's an e-commerce project where the admin can do the CRUD operations easily. Also, he can find all the orders and the clients.

title: Agence V4
description: I collaborated with a coworker to develop an admin dashboard using TypeScript and Next.js. I also created an action plan for a WordPress page that includes a form and implemented the page using the Gravity Forms plugin. Additionally, I customized the form's CSS styling to align with the desired design.

title: Logiauto
description: I collaborated with a designer and a project manager to develop a website using WordPress, Elementor, CSS, and JavaScript. We ensured the project respected the deadline and prioritized user experience to deliver an effective and high-quality solution.

title: E-Training
description: I collaborated with a developer to modify an existing Laravel solution and develop an e-training website, utilizing Laravel with MySQL for the database and Bootstrap/TailwindCSS for the front end. This web application tracks client statuses and provides super admins and managers with tools to efficiently oversee and manage client processes.
